briefTitle: Exploratory Study of Breast Cancer With ABY025
officialTitle: An Exploratory Study to Evaluate the Distribution of [111In]ABY-025 Uptake for SPECT Imaging in Subjects With Metastatic Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* female age \>20 years
* one or more known metastases localizations

Exclusion Criteria:

* other critical disease than breast cancer
* age ≤ 20 years
